objects.name: AIA_FLAG_AI_VALIDATION_RULE_SHOW_FLAG_WHEN
objects.description: Recommended: False. When True users can instruct AI Validation Rule prompt to flag when conditions are true or false instead of defining conditions that always throw validation when true. This has shown lower accuracy and consistency so is not recommended
